items.label: 58d2f26b5457a3f61dd557f0
items.name: Optional Residential Time-Of-Use (RT) Single Phase
items.description: For residential service to single family residences or individual family apartments supplied through one meter, including incidental family use, on the appurtenant premises. This Rate Schedule is not applicable to commercial type use on the appurtenant premises such as chicken brooding and grain drying. Where a portion of the residence premises (not separately metered) is used for nonresidential purposes, the predominant use of the service, as determined by the Company, shall determine the Rate Schedule applicable to all service. Service is for the use of the customer and may not be shared and may not be resold to others. Not applicable to standby or supplementary service.
items.basicinformationcomments:
Formula Rate Plan (FRP) and the Municipal Franchise Adjustment Rider (MFA) are adjustments included in the calculation of rates
by the utility but not included in the URDB due to how the two riders are calculated on other variable conditions.
items.energycomments: Adjustments = Fuel and Purchased Power Cost factor + Grand Gulf rider + Production Costs Allocation rider + Federal Litigation Consulting Fee Rate adjustment + Energy Efficiency Cost Rate rider + Storm Recovery Charges rider + Capacity Cost Recovery rider + MISO rider.
